error.description: We couldn't load the manga rankings at this time.

loading.description: Please wait while we fetch the latest manga rankings.

metaTitle.default: Manga Rankings - Top Manga by Views, Ratings & Bookmarks

metaDescription.default: Discover the most popular manga with our comprehensive rankings. Find top manga by views, ratings, bookmarks, and trending status across daily, weekly, monthly, and all-time periods.
metaDescription.mostViewed: Explore the {period} most viewed manga rankings. Discover what manga readers are enjoying most with real-time view statistics and trending data.
metaDescription.highestRated: Find the {period} highest rated manga based on user reviews and ratings. Discover critically acclaimed manga with the best reader scores.
metaDescription.mostBookmarked: Browse the {period} most bookmarked manga. See what manga readers are saving to their favorites and adding to their reading lists.
metaDescription.trending: Check out the {period} trending manga that are gaining popularity. Discover rising stars and hot new releases in the manga world.

viewStats.title: View Statistics for {type}
viewStats.trendsDescription: Historical view trends will be available here

notifications.newChapterDescription: Get notified when your favorited manga releases new chapters
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: You'll receive notifications here when your favorited manga get new chapters.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Manga Next, we're passionate about bringing the best manga reading experience to fans worldwide. Our mission is to provide a comprehensive, user-friendly platform where manga enthusiasts can discover, read, and enjoy their favorite series.

features.title: What We Offer
items: Extensive manga library with thousands of titles
Regular updates with the latest chapters

team.title: Our Team
team.content: We're a dedicated team of manga lovers, developers, and designers working together to create the ultimate manga reading platform.

items.question: How do I create an account?
items.answer: Click on the 'Login' button in the header and select 'Register' to create a new account.

items.question: How do I add manga to my favorites?
items.answer: Visit any manga page and click the heart icon to add it to your favorites list.

items.question: How do I report issues with chapters?
items.answer: Use the report button on any chapter page to notify us of problems like missing pages or incorrect content.

items.question: Can I read manga offline?
items.answer: Currently, our platform requires an internet connection to read manga.

contact.title: Still Need Help?
contact.content: If you can't find the answer you're looking for, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, update your profile, or contact us for support.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can manage your account settings or contact us for assistance.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms and conditions for using our service

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

sections.title: Use License
sections.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on Manga Next's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only.

sections.title: Disclaimer
sections.content: The materials on Manga Next's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Manga Next makes no warranties, expressed or implied.

sections.title: Limitations
sections.content: In no event shall Manga Next or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on this website.

sections.title: User Conduct
sections.content: Users must not use the service for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, or impair the service.

sections.title: Copyright Policy
sections.content: Manga Next respects the intellectual property rights of others and expects users to do the same. We respond to notices of alleged copyright infringement that comply with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

sections.title: Filing a DMCA Notice
sections.content: If you believe that your copyrighted work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please provide our designated agent with the following information:

sections.title: Required Information
items: A physical or electronic signature of the copyright owner
Identification of the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed
Identification of the material that is claimed to be infringing
Information reasonably sufficient to permit us to contact you
A statement that you have a good faith belief that use of the material is not authorized
A statement that the information in the notification is accurate

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: Please send DMCA notices to our designated agent via the contact form or email provided on our contact page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

info.title: Other Ways to Reach Us
info.business: For business inquiries, please include detailed information about your request.
